paragraphs.title: Reddit Upward Trending Terms
paragraphs.text:
val reddit2012 = redditRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.toLong < 1359529600)
val reddit2014 = redditRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.toLong > 1359529600)
val topRedditTerms2012 = computeTopTerms(reddit2012, 100)
val topRedditTerms2014 = computeTopTerms(reddit2014, 100)
val redditTermRanks2012 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topRedditTerms2012)
val redditTermRanks2014 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topRedditTerms2014)
var redditRankChanges = computeTermRankChanges(redditTermRanks2012, redditTermRanks2014).sortBy(_._4).reverse
redditRankChanges = redditRankChanges.filter(entry => entry._3 != 0)
println(convertRankChangesToOutputText(redditRankChanges.take(20)))

paragraphs.title: Twitter Upward Trending Terms
paragraphs.text:
val tweets2012 = tweetsRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.contains("2012"))
val tweets2014 = tweetsRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.contains("2014"))
val topTweetTerms2012 = computeTopTerms(tweets2012, 100)
val topTweetTerms2014 = computeTopTerms(tweets2014, 100)
val twitterTermRanks2012 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topTweetTerms2012)
val twitterTermRanks2014 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topTweetTerms2014)
var tweetRankChanges = computeTermRankChanges(twitterTermRanks2012, twitterTermRanks2014).sortBy(_._4).reverse

tweetRankChanges = tweetRankChanges.filter(entry => entry._3 != 0)
println(convertRankChangesToOutputText(tweetRankChanges.take(20)))

paragraphs.title: Reddit Downward Trending Terms
paragraphs.text:
val reddit2012 = redditRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.toLong < 1359529600)
val reddit2014 = redditRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.toLong > 1359529600)
val topRedditTerms2012 = computeTopTerms(reddit2012, 100)
val topRedditTerms2014 = computeTopTerms(reddit2014, 100)
val redditTermRanks2012 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topRedditTerms2012)
val redditTermRanks2014 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topRedditTerms2014)
var redditRankChanges = computeTermRankChanges(redditTermRanks2012, redditTermRanks2014).sortBy(_._4)
redditRankChanges = redditRankChanges.filter(entry => entry._3 != 0)
println(convertRankChangesToOutputText(redditRankChanges.take(20)))

paragraphs.title: Twitter Downward Trending Terms
paragraphs.text:
val tweets2012 = tweetsRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.contains("2012"))
val tweets2014 = tweetsRDD.filter(Post => Post.created_at.contains("2014"))
val topTweetTerms2012 = computeTopTerms(tweets2012, 100)
val topTweetTerms2014 = computeTopTerms(tweets2014, 100)
val twitterTermRanks2012 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topTweetTerms2012)
val twitterTermRanks2014 = convertOccurencesToRanks(topTweetTerms2014)
var tweetRankChanges = computeTermRankChanges(twitterTermRanks2012, twitterTermRanks2014).sortBy(_._4)
tweetRankChanges = tweetRankChanges.filter(entry => entry._3 != 0)
println(convertRankChangesToOutputText(tweetRankChanges.take(20)))

paragraphs.title: Top Twitter hashtags
paragraphs.text:
%sql 
select term, count(*) count from tweet_terms where substring(term, 0, 1) == "#" group by term order by count desc limit 100

paragraphs.title: Query functions

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType}
computeTopTerms: (postRdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Post], count: Int)Array[(String, Int)]
computeTotalWordCount: (postRdd: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Post])Long
convertOccurencesToRanks: (termOccurences: Array[(String, Int)])Array[(String, Int)]
lookupRank: (term: String, termRanks: Array[(String, Int)])Int
computeTermRankChanges: (before: Array[(String, Int)], after: Array[(String, Int)])Array[(String, Int, Int, Int)]
convertTermCountsToOutputText: (termCounts: Array[(String, Int)])String
convertRankChangesToOutputText: (rankChanges: Array[(String, Int, Int, Int)])String
updateStopwords: (toCreate: String, toDelete: String)String
words: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[874] at flatMap at <console>:77
filteredWords: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[876] at filter at <console>:82
schemaString: String = term
schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(term,StringType,true))
rowRDD: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = MapPartitionsRDD[877] at map at <console>:86
tweetTermsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [term: string]

paragraphs.title: Constants
paragraphs.text:
val DataLocation = "/Users/taylorpeer/Projects/BI/data/"

case class Post(text: String, created_at: String, platform: String, popularity: Long)
